IntelGenerator.baronIntelHeader:
Nice to Know You

Dear Mr. Sir,
IntelGenerator.baronIntelBody:
I know this message will come to you as surprised but permit me of my desire to go into business relationship with you.
I am Dr. Kennedy Brazington a cousin to late Hector Balaska of Sindria Diktat Astronaut whom was murdered during the recent civil war in Sindria Diktat region ., before his death my late father was a strong supporter of he.
In the 14-years since the time, he has accumulated lobster holding amounting to value almost %s Credits. I am here seeking avenue to transfer lobster fund to you in only you're reliable and Trustworthy person to Investment the fund. I am told this will cost %s Credits in order to access the his fund I need your assistance.
Needless to say the trust reposed on you at this juncture is enormous. In return I will sharing 20 percent of the amount to you. Kindly expedite action to enable downpayment.
IntelGenerator.baronIntelPaid: Without a second thought, you wired %s credits to the account indicated by the message. Was this really a good idea?
IntelGenerator.baronIntelDismissed: You coldly dismissed the message. Whoever they are, they'll have to find someone else in the desolate stars to help them now...
IntelGenerator.baronConfirmPay: Are you sure? This will irreversibly wire %s from your account to the bank account information attached to the message...
IntelGenerator.baronConfirmDismiss: You consider dismissing the message, but can't help but feel you could be missing out on a lucrative opportunity this cycle...
IntelGenerator.invasionIntelSummary: %s %s invading %s in the %s star system, held by %s. The invasion forces are projected to be %s and are likely comprised of %s fleets.
IntelGenerator.invasionIntelForces: Compared to the defenses, the invasion's space forces are %s and its ground forces are %s. The invasion is likely to be successful.
IntelGenerator.invasionIntelStatusSystem: The invasion force is currently in-system.
IntelGenerator.encryptedIntelHeader: Your communications department notifies you of an unexpected incoming transmission on your transceiver channel. Your head comms officer hands you a transcript:
